title: Workplace bullying, violence are risk factors for type 2 diabetes, new research reveals

title_detail.value: Workplace bullying, violence are risk factors for type 2 diabetes, new research reveals

summary: Workplace bullying and violence may increase the risk of type 2 diabetes, for both men and women, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: Workplace bullying and violence may increase the risk of type 2 diabetes, for both men and women, according to new research.
